data.name: PartyOn
data.description:
Join the best virtual music party ever. Sing like a star in the most interactive online karaoke.

PartyOn is a virtual music event app. In PartyOn, users from all over the world can hold various music events, from sing-along parties to concerts with thousands of people.

Unique Features: 

Awesome Lively Avatars 
Customize your own full-body 3D avatar like a true rock star! Comes with a range of facial expressions and gestures.

Immersive and Gorgeous Virtual Rooms 
Sing your heart out from nightclubs to outer space. Ignite that party mood in places unimaginable. 

Selection of Music and MV Content 
Top popular karaoke songs by the hundreds, infused with virtual super-effects and avatar animations to blast your senses to the stars. 

Real-Time Social Interactions 
Sophisticated audio systems for truly one-of-a-kind party spaces, chat and interact with fun and wonky objects/emojis as you enjoy live singing from around the globe. 

More awesomeness coming up!
